attributes.action: give people the power to witness the destruction of there Dna and finger prints that meet theExceptional grounds for earlier destruction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to give peopel the power to witness the destruction of Dna and finger prints that meet the Exceptional grounds for earlier destruction. As set out in the homeoffice consultation document. Grounds might include cases of wrongful/unlawful arrest, mistaken identity, or in cases where it emerges no crime has been committed.(geting the right people on the data base doc 2009)
